description:
Kyle had come out for a few days for a visit.

He kind of wanted to be thrown into the deep end of the pool, so to speak.

"I've been saving my nut," he said. "I'm ready to do lots of fucking."

It was a busy couple of days for him.

First up was a hot flip-flop with Jonah. They took turns ramming each other's asses until they were both sweaty and spent.

Kyle got a day off, and then he got the shit fucked out of him by Jesse!
title: Kyle & Jonah Flip Flop
